executable.title: Model Maker
executable.description: Create 3D surface models from segmented data. Imported from Slicer 2. Use File - Import Scene to view generated data. If specify a list of Labels, it will over ride any start/end label settings.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

directory.name: OutputDirectory
directory.label: Output Directory
directory.description: Directory in which to save model(s)

file.name: ModelSceneFile
file.label: Model Scene File
file.description: An output file containing the MRML scene with the models generated by the model maker. Must manually load the scene.

integer-vector.name: Labels
integer-vector.description: A comma separated list of label values from which to make models. Over-rides the Start/End Labels in the Make Multiple section. Make sure they're in ascending order.
integer-vector.label: Labels

string.name: Name
string.label: Model Name
string.description: Name to use for this model. If making multiple models, use this as a prefix to the label color name

float.name: Decimate
float.label: Decimate
float.description: Target reduction during decimation, as a decimal percentage reduction in the number of polygons.

boolean.name: SplitNormals
boolean.label: Split Normals
boolean.description: Splitting normals is useful for visualizing sharp features. However it creates holes in surfaces which affects measurements

string-enumeration.name: FilterType
string-enumeration.label: Filter Type
string-enumeration.description: Controls the type of smoothing done after the model is built.

parameters.label: Anatomical Information
parameters.description: Use external information to name models

string.name: ColorNodeName
string.label: Color Node Name
string.description: The name of a colour table node (must be a Slicer3 default node for now) that is used to look up names and colours associated with label values.

file.name: AnatomyLabelFile
file.label: Anatomy Label File
file.description: A file containing a comma separted list of anatomy names and label numbers. If not set, a best guess color look up table will be used.

boolean.name: SkipUnNamed
boolean.label: Skip Un-Named Labels
boolean.description: If true and an Anatomy Label File is specified, only models which have an entry in the Anatomy Label File will be generated. If false, generate all models that exist within the label range.

parameters.label: Create Multiple
parameters.description: Create more than one model at the same time, used for continuous ranges of labels.

boolean.name: GenerateAll
boolean.label: Generate All Models
boolean.description: Generate models for all labels in the input volume. Ignores Start Label and End Label settings.

integer.name: StartLabel
integer.label: Start Label
integer.description: Voxel value from which to start making models. Used instead of the label list to specify a range (make sure the label list is empty or it will over ride this).

integer.name: EndLabel
integer.label: End Label
integer.description: Voxel value up to which to continue making models. Skip any values with zero voxels.

boolean.name: JointSmoothing
boolean.label: Joint Smoothing
boolean.description: Perform joint smoothing between all models, so that they will fit together.
